solution_line_template: On the first day, Lucca ate {first_day_fraction}*{total_bread_pieces} = <<{first_day_fraction}*{total_bread_pieces}={eaten_first_day}>>{eaten_first_day} pieces.

On the second day, Lucca ate {second_day_fraction}*{remaining_after_first_day} = <<{second_day_fraction}*{remaining_after_first_day}={eaten_second_day}>>{eaten_second_day} pieces of bread.
